text: John Clive (6 January 1933 â€“ 14 October 2012) was an English writer, actor and voice talent. He acted in movies as well as on television stage and radio. Clive had important parts in the movies Yellow Submarine, Carry on Board, Carry on Dick, The Gnomes of Dulwich, Tiffany Jones, and Clockwork Orange. Clive was born on January 6, 1933 in North London, England. Clive died on October 14, 2012 from a short illness in his home in England, aged 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1933 births Category:2012 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English radio actors Category:English voice actors Category:20th-century English writers Category:Actors from London Category:Writers from London
title: John Clive
